title: Miles2006
author: Miles2006
content: As I started my bitcoin journey last month I observe say bitcoin knowledge is very backward in the country and bitcoin knowledge na wetin everybody go fit acquire in a simple way. According to wetin Satoshi Nakamoto talk bitcoin is for everyone and people who become part of the technology, and that's why I'm using p2p. I come dey wonder for naija way we so I no know for your area but for my area i no too dey hear bitcoin, the thing no dey popular for my area. Most people never hear the word bitcoin for their life self, so how we go do?Last time I wrote about a topic will Nigerians marketers accept bitcoin if legalize. I saw different comments say them go accept, but to accept bitcoin no be the problem, them get the knowledge about bitcoin? Because wetin person no know big pass am by far. People need to get a solid knowledge about bitcoin first before using it and how to secure their coins/wallet if possible make them get guide wey go guide them through because if bitcoin dey legalize for naija scammers go dey invent new methods every day just like the way scammers dey for fiat. In essence I wan talk say make we dey teach about bitcoin for our area because as bitcoin dey grow so countries go make bitcoin dey legalize as the world dey develop with different technology and Nigeria no go dey left behind, I believe say Nigeria go make bitcoin as their legal tender one day. So make we start to dey teach the knowledge about bitcoin so that the thing no go dey new for people ear.  students/children I have seen many threads on children education and I also want to contribute my view, one thing I observe about children them dey very sharp when it comes to learning especially learning about technology. I go like say make we start to dey teach the younger ones about cryptocurrency(bitcoin). Teaching them about the advantages and disadvantages about bitcoin, the risk involve and everything wey person suppose know about bitcoin. Some go say wetin concern small pikin and bitcoin, so as long as the pikin don know good or bad that pikin fit learn about bitcoin, so creating the awareness of bitcoin to our children is one of the best idea. Here are some threads about educating children about bitcoin: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5438924.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5432314.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5454984.160 business owners: I think if you're a business owner maybe you're into selling of goods, clothes or supermakert, is best if you accept bitcoin as your pay in return. By so doing you're creating the awareness of bitcoin to your customers for example a school principal accepting crypto (bitcoin) as a school fees payment, he also stated that he believe that one day digital money will gain more acceptance than paper money so he wants to be part of the technology now.https://cointelegraph.com/news/nigerian-secondary-school-will-accept-crypto-payments-despite-regulatory-uncertaintyLastly bloggers, if you dey into blogging, make your site dey talk about cryptocurrency(bitcoin), cause everyone makes use of the internet everyday.

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: With the growing popularity of Bitcoin in Nigeria, it's more important than ever to educate people on this new form of digital currency. This article will provide information on what Bitcoin is, how it works, and how people in Nigeria can use it.For starters, Bitcoin is a decentralized digital currency that uses cryptography to secure its transactions and control the creation of new units. It's not controlled by any central authority, which makes it different from traditional currencies like the Nigerian naira.Bitcoin can be bought, sold, and exchanged for other currencies and goods and services.One of the key benefits of Bitcoin for Nigerians is that it offers a way to bypass the often-unreliable banking system. Bitcoin transactions are processed through a peer-to-peer network, meaning that users can send and receive money without having to go through a bank or other financial institution. This can be especially useful for those who live in rural areas or who don't have access to traditional banking services.Another benefit of Bitcoin is that it's a hedge against inflation. The Nigerian naira has been subject to significant inflation in recent years, and Bitcoin can help to protect against this.

In essence I wan talk say make we dey teach about bitcoin for our area because as bitcoin dey grow so countries go make bitcoin dey legalize as the world dey develop with different technology and Nigeria no go dey left behind, I believe say Nigeria go make bitcoin as their legal tender one day. So make we start to dey teach the knowledge about bitcoin so that the thing no go dey new for people ear.  students/children I have seen many threads on children education and I also want to contribute my view, one thing I observe about children them dey very sharp when it comes to learning especially learning about technology. I go like say make we start to dey teach the younger ones about cryptocurrency(bitcoin). Teaching them about the advantages and disadvantages about bitcoin, the risk involve and everything wey person suppose know about bitcoin. Some go say wetin concern small pikin and bitcoin, so as long as the pikin don know good or bad that pikin fit learn about bitcoin, so creating the awareness of bitcoin to our children is one of the best idea. Here are some threads about educating children about bitcoin: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5438924.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5432314.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5454984.160 business owners: I think if you're a business owner maybe you're into selling of goods, clothes or supermakert, is best if you accept bitcoin as your pay in return. By so doing you're creating the awareness of bitcoin to your customers for example a school principal accepting crypto (bitcoin) as a school fees payment, he also stated that he believe that one day digital money will gain more acceptance than paper money so he wants to be part of the technology now.https://cointelegraph.com/news/nigerian-secondary-school-will-accept-crypto-payments-despite-regulatory-uncertaintyLastly bloggers, if you dey into blogging, make your site dey talk about cryptocurrency(bitcoin), cause everyone makes use of the internet everyday.My brother Bitcoin no be wetin you go just wake up learn over night and understand they are still many things you need to learn ooo just last month now you don dey feel yourself say you don understand Bitcoin and the values behind am no be so still try check some topics about Bitcoin and some threads as you talk so Bitcoin no be everyone know am maybe your area no dey exposed thats why for my side even 15 year old know wetin them dey call Bitcoin and for today so wen e be say everything dey the internet I believe many people don hear am but them fit still never understand the potentials.
